author: peterjones
msg: Added in some more extended types to the type tests.
There's a couple jaxb ri issues for which a few of the tests have been
commented out:
rpc-literal tests of the xsd:date types cause a ClassCastException in
the jaxb code.
For a couple of the enumeration types - ColourEnum for instance - the
generated fromValue() method isn't declared static.
Restrictions in the schema aren't enforced, e.g., maxLength.
And couple of other things to note:
The ri generated code flattens nested struct/choice in the schema
to the toplevel class.  However the spec seems to say that the default
should be to generate the nested classes.
There are certain types in which the generated method signatures for the
doc-literal and rpc-literal styles differ (use List vs array).

author: adisakala
msg: Test case for operation name lookup problem (soap doc/lit bare).
http://www.objectweb.org/wws/arc/celtix-dev/2005-12/msg00020.html
Fixed marshalling of runtime exceptions as faults in server binding.

author: dkulp
msg: Start of http policy work
Implement all the HTTPClientPolicies in the HTTPClientTransport
Implement most of the HTTPServerPolicies in the HTTPServerTransport
No tests yet as there isn't an ability to configure the policies yet.  Merging now so people can see before our policy discussion on Monday.
